author: bridge-bot
content:
<CarlBeek> RollCall #12 tomorrow Wed 21, 14:00 UTC

It should be a quick one as we're still figuring out the L1 <> L2 R&D dynamic, so the major agenda items are:

1. Discussion of introducing a limit on the number of Blobs per L1 Tx
2. L1 R&D updates

If you have any other topics you'd like to discuss, leave a comment on the issue: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1461
